posts.title: Overhead Garage Rack
posts.content: This overhead garage rack is the perfect solution to keeping your space decluttered and organized. Once mounted to your ceiling, this 14 gauge steel rack will be able to hold up to 600 pounds, allowing you to maximize your limited storage space like never before.

posts.title: Dog Treat Pez Dispenser
posts.content: Reward your well behaved canine using the dog treat Pez dispenser. This over-sized dispenser comes packed with six all natural dog treats with real meat flavor. It makes an excellent gift idea for both dogs and their Pez dispenser collecting masters.

posts.title: Shit You’re Old Birthday Candles
posts.content: Let your loved one know they’re getting old as fuck while still keeping their real age a mystery by lighting up these “shit ur old” birthday candles. Each letter comes in a vibrant color and is outfitted with a small plastic stake at the base so that you can stand them upright.

posts.title: Thumb Ring Book Page Holder
posts.content: Not since The Clapper has an invention so simple yet so brilliant come along as the thumb ring book page holder. Designed to comfortably fit around your thumb, this clever tool will make reading softback books easy with the use of just one hand.

posts.title: The Hungover Cookbook
posts.content: The best way to cure a hangover is <del>to drink even more alcohol</del> eat healthy foods and drink plenty of water. The Hungover Cookbook is a recipe book to bring you back to life in the aftermath of a major binge drinking session.

posts.title: Tennis Ball Launcher
posts.content: Get into some intense games of fetch the ball with your dog with this sling shot style ball launcher. Capable of shooting a tennis ball up to 220 feet in distance, this slingshot tennis ball launcher is great for a day at the park with your dog.

posts.title: Antique Quill Calligraphy Pen
posts.content: Bring class and style back to the art of writing by creating your works using this antique quill calligraphy pen. This Harry Potter themed set comes with one bottle of ink and an elegant quill – accented with an actual feather – that writes clean and smooth.

posts.title: 5-in-1 BBQ Grilling Multi Tool
posts.content: Help keep your cooking area clutter-free during your next feast by using this 5-in-1 BBQ grilling multi-tool. This over-sized Swiss Army knife is outfitted with a marinade brush, a fork, a corkscrew, a bottle opener, and a removable spatula.

posts.title: Mindless Violence Coloring Book
posts.content: Suppress your primal desires for bloodshed by channeling your violent tendencies into this Mindless Violence coloring book. Each page offers a vibrant and hilarious example of mindless vandalism and downright disorder like men fighting over a parking space.

posts.title: Military Grade Baby Carrier
posts.content: Ensure your bundle of joy remains safe when you head out by placing them inside this military grade baby carrier. This tactical baby carrier features a MOLLE attachment system on the front and back, a sun shield, and a sturdy 100D nylon outer construction.

posts.title: Batman Snuggie Blanket
posts.content: Keep warm and look like the Dark Knight with this Batman snuggie blanket! The snuggie blanket allows your hands to be free while still giving you the benefit of wearing a full adult size blanket, and makes a great gift idea for the little crime fighter.

posts.title: Camping Survival Guide
posts.content: Stay alive when venturing into the great outdoors by studying up with the camping survival guide. This indispensable book will teach you everything from how to successfully attain sustenance to what plants can provide nourishment or potentially kill you.
